data.text: Ezɨ Sofar Naman kantrin gumazim, a kamaghɨn Jop mɨgei:
Nɨ ghaze, mɨgɨrɨgɨar nɨ amizir kaba, da bar mɨgɨrɨgɨar aghuiba.
Egh a nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko fofozir aghuimɨn mɨngarimɨn gun nɨ mɨkɨmasa, kɨ ifonge.
“Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itimɨn fofozir aghuiba ko nɨghnɨzir aghuiba,
Godɨn fofozimɨn ababanim, Godɨn Nguibamɨn mɨn bar pɨn iti.
God izɨ nɨ inigh kotɨn mangɨva nɨ isɨ kalabus datɨghtɨ,
God ifavarir arazibagh amir gumazamizibagh fo.
Nɨ gantɨ, donkin amebam gumazir boritam bateghan kogham.
“Jop, nɨ navim giragh uan agharimning fegh God ko mɨkɨmɨva an azangsɨghtɨ,
Nɨ arazir kuratam damigh, egh akɨrim ragh uan arazir kuram gasaragh.
Nɨ kamaghɨn damigh uam osɨmtɨziba puvatɨgh bar akuegham.
Egh nɨ uan osɨmtɨzim ko mɨzazim gɨn amadagham.
Egh nɨ fogham, God bar deraghvɨra nɨ geghuvam.
Gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amiba, me akurvazim bagh gan ikɨvɨra ikiam.
